content.title: This is Party Powered
content.message:
A simple studio that makes apps sometimes, games some days.
And if I'm sure of something, is that I like PALE beer with some popcorn af.

content.title: What are we doing
content.message:
Right now is hard to say.
We go where the wind blows. Some days I develop clicker games. Other days I play clicker games.
Please do not think I like clicker games, it is just I cannot stop playing them.
